dc_title_s: A chart of the Indian Ocean : improved from the chart of M. D'Apres De Mannevillette ; with the addition of a part of the Pacifi
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:15 500 000."Approved by the chart committee of the Admiralty." Inset: Anemo-hydrography of the monsoons according to Viconte Grenier. Map of Indian Ocean and Western Pacific showing tracks of various navigators, dates of discoveries, with relief shown pictorially.|59 x 112 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:15 500 000|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
dc_publisher_s: W. Faden Geographer to the King and to H.R.H. the Prince of Wales; London
